summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Fifth Avenue Northeast, in the City of Seattle, from East Eighty-second Street to East Eighty-fifth Street, by laying water mains therein of proper dimensions and materials, together with all gates, tees, crosses and other appurtenances necessary for the proper water service of said district, in accordance with Resolution No. 2091 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
